title: Authentication Service
headers: Abstract element Password Based Identity Provider
content:
Protects invoking of services by using a username and password and enriches the request with the identity of the request originator.

The component may be used for internal communication requests as well as for requests going to the web service port. In	the second case you have to use RequiredRoleFiler in theHttp Dispatcher. You can define several different authentication methods. When resolving identity, all defined methods are asked one by one until one of them returns some identity. Therefore, it is important to put the methods in correct order.

This method is the recommended solution for password protection of access to the server.
